item.title: Obet add a quote by Putu Wijaya
item.description: "bagus ceritanya" -- Putu Wijaya

item.title: Obet add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Obet add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Obet add a quote by Soekarno
item.description: "This country, the Republic of Indonesia, does not belong to any group, nor to any religion, nor to any ethnic group, nor to any group with customs and traditions, but the property of all of us from Sabang to Merauke!" -- Soekarno

item.title: Obet add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Obet add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Obet add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality. Wake Up and Live!" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Obet add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Obet add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Obet add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Don't think or judge, just listen." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Obet add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Don't worry about a thing, every little thing is gonna be alright" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Obet add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Obet add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Obet add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Obet add a quote by Soekarno
item.description: "Kami menggoyangkan langit, menggempakan darat, dan menggelorakan samudera agar tidak jadi bangsa yang hidup hanya dari 2 Â½ sen sehari. Bangsa yang kerja keras, bukan bangsa tempe, bukan bangsa kuli. Bangsa yang rela menderita demi pembelian cita-cita" -- Soekarno

item.title: Obet add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
Obet add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Ketika kau masih bertemu pagi dan putuskan diri untuk berdiri menghadapi berjuang dengan hati di jalan Illahi maka saat itu kau telah mengakhiri hari dengan satu lagi kemenangan sejati " -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Obet add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: " Kita pun akan terus merangkai kata, menjelma kalimat kalimat yang kita tanam sepenuh cinta pada semesta. Semoga tumbuh menjadi berlian kecil di hati pembaca." -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Obet add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Obet add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description:
"Maafkan Jika senyumku Tersembunyi dibalik air mata Dan kata-kata mesra Menjadi tanpa daya Karena terperangkap Dalam Prasangka
Tapi Tuhan Tahu.. Cinta yang kupunya Lebih berwarna Dari yang kau kira" -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Obet add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Obet add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Obet add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Obet add a quote by Hamka
item.description: "Kecantikan yang abadi terletak pada keelokan adab dan ketinggian ilmu seseorang. Bukan terletak pada wajah dan pakaiannya" -- Hamka

item.title: Obet add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Obet add a quote by Amy Sedaris
item.description: "I think it's good for a person to spend time alone. It gives them an opportunity to discover who they are and to figure out why they are always alone." -- Amy Sedaris

item.title: Obet add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Obet add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Obet add a quote by dee
item.description: "Seindah apa pun huruf terukir, dapatkah ia bermakna apabila tak ada jeda? Dapatkan ia dimengerti jika tak ada spasi? Bukankah kita baru bisa bergerak jika ada jarak? Dan saling menyayang bila ada ruang?" -- dee

item.title: Obet add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "seorang terpelajar harus sudah berbuat adil sejak dalam pikiran apalagi dalam perbuatan" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer
